about_the_game:
It’s Halloween night. You had nothing planned, but your friends dragged you out.

Explore the neighborhood and meet its curious inhabitants. Find out what’s going on with the new fast-food restaurant in town that seems to draw everyone’s attention, and solve puzzles by using bizarre mobile apps.

  • Immerse yourself in the story and mysteries surrounding your neighborhood
  • Gather weird mobile apps and use them to solve puzzles and other missions
  • Follow the main story, or explore the surroundings to find new missions and secrets
  • Explore the neighborhood and all its nooks and crannies: the fast-food restaurant, the grocery store, the "haunted" house...
  • Achieve your collector dreams: get all of the 9 mobiles apps ; find all secret phone numbers & photos ; unlock all modes on the different apps

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10 or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Burder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: On Halloween night, explore your neighborhood and solve puzzles with weird mobile apps, as strange events start to occur.
